name: Chaak Tun Caverns And Beach Club By Explora
description:
CHAAK TUN CAVERNS AND BEACH CLUB BY EXPLORA. Experience the sensation of swimming underneath the ground in majestic caverns that were inhabited by the mayans centuries ago. Have a unique and mistic experience as you swim and walk through stalactites and stalagmites protruding all around you.

Later visit the famous Señor Frog's and delight in delicious complementary plate of food and beverage. End this amazing day with some free time to relax at the beach club or visit Playa del Carmens famous 5th avenue to do some shopping.
